tdmtpy.image.beach_mw_depth¶

beach_mw_depth(tensors, depth, event, show, format)[source]¶

Plot depth search result

A function that plots focal mechanism, variance reduction, and moment magnitude as a function of source depth.

Parameters

  • tensors (a list of Tensor) – moment tensor solutions at various depths.

  • depth (float) – depth of solution with maximum variance reduction.

  • event (dict) – event origin time, longitude and latitude, refer to Configure for details.

  • show (bool) – Turn on interactive display.

  • format (str) – figure file format.
